txt.en: 'Ah, [placeholder], you have returned to the Vale at a time when we could use someone with your skills. A look-out upon the beacon of Eilendoth has spotted a Corsair raiding party heading north. They recently went into the southern woods where we lost sight. Perhaps you would be able to head them off before they discover Ethring.'
Candúr can be found in the village of Ethring.\n\nYou should speak with Candúr.
After the events in the Nimrond caverns, Ringló Vale faces continued threats, including Corsair raiding parties from the south.
'Ethring shall remain hidden from the conflict in the south thanks to your efforts in defeating the Corsair raiding party.'
Corsairs can be found in the southern woods of Ringló Vale.\n\nYou should defeat Corsairs.
